source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_fact_absence_all
AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    T7.CalendarDate AS AbsenceDate,
    -- T1.AbsenceStartDate,
    -- T1.AbsenceEndDate,
    T1.Hours AS AbsenceHours,
    T1.EmployeeID AS StaffNumber,
    T6.WorkScheduleRule,
    T1.AbsenceType,
    T1.SicknessGroup,
    CASE 
        WHEN AbsenceType = 'Sickness' THEN 'Sickness'
        WHEN AbsenceType LIKE '%Annual%' THEN 'Annual'
        ElSE '0'
    END AS AbsenceGroup,
    CASE    
        WHEN T6.WorkDayHours = 0 THEN T1.HOURS
        WHEN T6.WorkDayHours = '' THEN T1.HOURS
        WHEN T6.WorkDayHours IS NULL THEN T1.HOURS
        ELSE T1.Hours/T6.WorkDayHours
    END AS Leave,
	case date_part("DAYOFWEEK",AbsenceStartDate)
		when 2 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 3 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 4 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 5 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 6 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		else null
	end as LeaveONS,
    -- T6.WorkDayHours,
    -- T5.Description PayBand,
    T5.PSGroupCode AS PSGroup,
    T3.Description AS PersonnelArea,
    T4.Description AS PersonnelSubArea,
    T1.AbsenceID AS SicknessID,
	T1.Days as SicknessLength,
    CASE 
        WHEN CAST(Days AS FLOAT) > 20.0 then 'long-term'
		ELSE 'short-term'
    END AS SicknessLengthType

FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact T2 ON T1.EmployeeID=T2.EmployeeID AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_area_dim T3 ON T3.PersonnelAreaID=T2.PersonnelAreaID AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim T4 ON T4.PersonnelSubAreaID=T2.PersonnelSubAreaID AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payband_dim T5 ON T5.PayBandID=T2.PayBandID AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_work_schedule_dim T6 ON T6.WorkScheduleID = T2.WorkScheduleID AND T6.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL OUTER JOIN default.calendar_dim_plus T7 ON T7.CalendarDate >= T1.AbsenceStartDate AND T7.CalendarDate <= T1.AbsenceEndDate

WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'
ORDER BY StaffNumber,AbsenceDate

%%sql
create or replace table odw_curated_db.mipins_fact_absence_all
using delta
as
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_fact_absence_all
